settings.heading: Free-Fall Kids
settings.body:
Introducing Honor The Gift® 2021 Collection: Free-Fall. “What does it feel like when gravity can’t hold us back?” This question was the driving force of Free-fall development. Inspired by the legendary Tuskegee Airmen who served as the first African-American military aviators in the U.S. Army Air Corps.

Some will tell you that you can’t fly.

We ask, why not?
